choices.name: Okay_to_use_refurbished_open_box
choices.choiceText: Okay to use refurbished/ open box

rules.name: UserDemosGood
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5) OR (1 AND 2 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6)
rules.label: UserDemosGood

recordLookups.name: getCountryCodes
recordLookups.label: getCountryCodes
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 2) OR ( 3 AND 4) OR (2 AND 3) OR (1 AND 4)

recordUpdates.description: update Contact fields when they were null values
recordUpdates.name: udpateContactDemos_0
recordUpdates.label: udpateContactDemos

fields.name: agreementErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
There is an error!! You must fix to submit this request.


You cannot waive an agreement for a Reseller. Resellers must sign the eval agreement but can waive the credit card. Either remove the Eval Agreement waiver or Change the billing contact to the end user. Close this Screen and update the Eval and the use the Submit for Approval button on the top right of Eval Request page.

fields.name: addressHeader
fields.fieldText:
Verify the Shipping

Information


The default address is the Contact address but you can use any address. You can also Select a previously used address by clicking on an address used by this contact on the right side of screen.


Please use the Google Address Search Tool for quicker and more accurate addresses


**All Fields Required Except for State/Province Outside the US and Canada**


Shipping Contact: {!getevalData.Shipping_Contact_Name__r.FirstName} {!getevalData.Shipping_Contact_Name__r.LastName}

fields.name: addressHeader_0
fields.fieldText:
Verify the Shipping

Information


The default address is your address but you can use a different address.


Please use the Google Address Search Tool for quicker and more accurate addresses


**All Fields Required Except for State/Province Outside the US and Canada**

fields.name: addressHeader_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Verify the Billig

Information


We can change the information when it is time for the quote but Oracle needs Billing Information. The default address is the Billing Account address but you can use any address. You can also Select a previously used address by clicking on an address used by this contact on the right side of screen.


Please use the Google Address Search Tool for quicker and more accurate addresses


**All Fields Required Except for State/Province Outside the US and Canada**


Billing Contact: {!getevalData.Billing_Contact_Name__r.FirstName} {!getevalData.Billing_Contact_Name__r.LastName}

fields.name: specialDisplayText_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
***Do not add Address, It will create errors and delay the eval from being processed. **


The Shipping address in previous screen will be used. Special instruction examples are 'Lift Gate' or 'Gate Code 333'. You can add free text and/or use the commonly used options on the right.

validationRule.errorMessage:
There was an error. Please make sure that there are less than 255 characters. Fed Ex cannot add that many characters.


If you have less than 255 characters, then the error is due to an address in the instructions.


You cannot use the address in special instructions. It will break the Matrix and cause harm to the shipping. Please just put the correct address in the Shipping address in the first screen and everything will be as right as rain.

defaultValue.stringValue: *** Do Not Ship** This is a transferred eval from {!getevalData.Eval_Transfered_From__r.Name} {!getevalData.Special_Instructions__c}

validationRule.errorMessage:
You must have less than 255 Characters.


This eval will not have any units shipped out.

fields.name: defaultShippingOptions1
fields.fieldText: Default Options Select as Many as you Like

fields.name: specialDisplayText_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
***Do not add Address, It will create errors and delay the eval from being processed. **


The Shipping address in previous screen will be used. Special instruction examples are 'Lift Gate' or 'Gate Code 333'. You can add free text and/or use the commonly used options on the right.

fields.name: Special_Instructions_0
fields.helpText: Information to be visible in Oracle for Sales Admin.

validationRule.errorMessage:
not(CONTAINS({!Special_Instructions},{!street}))

&& not(CONTAINS({!Special_Instructions},{!city}+', '+{!state}))

&& not(CONTAINS({!Special_Instructions},{!city}+','+{!state})) 

&& not(CONTAINS({!Special_Instructions},{!city}+' '+{!state}))

&& {!len(Special_Instructions)<255}



There was an error. Please make sure that there are less than 255 characters. Fed Ex cannot add that many characters. 




If you have less than 255 characters, then the error is due to an address in the instructions.




You cannot use the address in special instructions. It will break the Matrix and cause harm to the shipping. Please just put the correct address in the Shipping address in the first screen and everything will be as right as rain.

fields.name: addressHeader_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Please Update ALL YOUR Address Information This is your demographic information.


Do Not put any other address other than your own.


**All fields Required**
